articles.title: New intriguing study claims humans might have first evolved in Europe, not Africa - WION
articles.description: New intriguing study claims humans might have first evolved in Europe, not Africa
articles.content:
A new intriguing study has claimed that the long-held belief that all apes and humans originated from Africa might not be true.
